subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jürgen Klinsmann brings European know-how to a land where he settled after his playing prime. He has believed since arriving 13 years ago that the United States ought to be a major player in the global game.
snippet: Jürgen Klinsmann brings European know-how to a land where he settled after his playing prime. He has believed since arriving 13 years ago that the United States ought to be a major player in the global game.
